website_summaries.verdict: This countertop filter adheres to top safety guidelines to provide affordable, alkaline, healthy drinking water.
pros: Alkaline filter adds minerals to the water and makes drinkable between 7.3 and 8.5 pH level – some owners reported up to 10 pH
Mineralized water tastes smooth and refreshing
cons: Replacement filters are expensive and hard to change

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it lasted. When it comes time to change the filter you better have Superman on steroids there to open it - even it he may not be able to. It’s extremely frustrating to throw money away on a new filter & end up having to throw the whole unit away bc there no way on God’s green Earth you can separate the base from the housing unit. Fix your flaws Apex!!!! Unacceptable!!!
customer_reviews.author: CorvetteNut

customer_reviews.title: Apex Filter
customer_reviews.text: I have a week with my Apex filter and I love it! I did the ph test and the result is between 8.0 and 8.5 enough alkaline level that the body needs. I did the test with Poland Spring and Fiji resulting from lower ph level.
customer_reviews.author: Arynyc

customer_reviews.title: look for algae after a few months of usage
customer_reviews.text: This was a great water filtration system until about 3 months in I noticed drinking water gave me a stomach ache. After carefully looking at the unit, you could see algae forming inside. I took pictures immediately and contacted APEX immediately. After a bunch of back and forth with customer service, I mailed the product back to them for a refund. After I sent them a confirmation of my tracking information, I was refunded my money for this item. I am really bummed it didnt work out because the product worked great at first.
customer_reviews.author: Ahayden

customer_reviews.title: 357 ppm tested water which is worse then tap water
customer_reviews.text: Failed water test with my TDS EZ tool. My tap water was 300 ppm (parts per million), and water filtered through this filter was 357 ppm which is worse then my tap water. My refrigerator filter water was at 234 ppm. Filtered drinking water at walmart dispenser was at 10 ppm. Acceptable drinking water should be in the 100 and below so this show where this filter stands.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: WATER IS VERY GOOD OUT OF
customer_reviews.text: COULD NOT CHANGE FILTER, IT WILL NOT COME APART TRIED EVERTHING. SENT IT BACK FOR THEM TO FIX. WATER IS VERY GOOD OUT OF FILTER
customer_reviews.author: H. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to replace the filter / water quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I am in my second year of using this filter and water quality seems good but I am currently trying to open the filter container up to replace the filter and it's stuck shut, I tried everything. I read other people's complaints about this, this is a real issue, you are basically are buying a single use item that you'd have to throw away after one cycle. I would really like some support from manufacturer here.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Lukjanenko

customer_reviews.title: BECAREFUL OF THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This Product Only REMOVES Trash from your Hard Tap Water. It's Not a great product as described. My water test rated at 237 before the APEX Counter Top. After hooking it up and cleaning the filters. It tested At 237 Again,Again,Again,Again. I don't recommend this product if you are looking to cut hard water contaminates in your Tap Water. It's NO GOOD FOR THAT! For the Price they charge. The best ones cost around $300-$3,000 Try AQUA tru.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Judon

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT! Tastes nasty.
customer_reviews.text: My water tastes like bad metal... I am EXTREMEKY disappointed that I paid $80 for this filter. I recently moved into my apartment and the water has a bad taste - slightly like chlorine. I purchased this filter hoping it would be the best cost effective solution. NO. It actually tastes WORSE! It tastes like water coming out of an old unmaintenanced public water fountain. Horrible! I do NOT recommend. I have no idea where all these "good tasting" reviews are coming from. Unfortunately I had such high hopes and expectations for this filter that I threw the box it came in. Otherwise it would be going right back. Truly truly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Yeraldin

customer_reviews.title: Filter replacement difficult
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this filtration system for several years. The water quality is great and is convenient to use. Filter replacement has always been and issue and I think that the new filter put in is going to be the last one! Filter housing is difficult to get off even after putting petroleum jelly on threads. Once you have put it back together then there is the problem of getting the filter housing to stop leaking. It's a design issue lack of places to get a good grip. They provide a spanner wench but it does not match the splines on the housing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: update: the filter started to grow a red mildew/mold in the top of it. My unit is not in the sunlight at all and is used daily. I have not had it 2 months. I’m totally not satisfied. This thing will make you sick!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and your health!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly wonderful product. The water taste great and I conducted my own test after two months of use using test strips from Home Depot and the result was just comforting. The unit still works and I cannot imagine life without it. I’ve kept it away from window and it’s still in excellent condition. I’ll probably replace the filter in another two months based on the results when I next conduct another test. It’s worth the price and your health.
customer_reviews.author: foxy_yet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much, Ryan, in Customer Service, for sending me the new faucet attachment to replace the one I had tightened up too much causing a leak. I talked to Ryan and he told me exactly what the problem was and sent new hardware. THAT is customer service. Love my Apex. I have been lugging gallon jugs of water from Walmart for too long. The Apex is wonderful. The water tastes great and I am a happy customer. This filter is well worth the price. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Save money, eliminate bottled water.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to decrease my family’s monthly expenses. Home delivery of bottled water was first on my list to eliminate. I searched amazon and came across the Apex countertop filter. Delivery was quick with prime. Installation was a breeze. It came with multiple adapters for the faucet. We use a lot of water for cooking and it’s so much easier with this filter, versus using the old rented water dispenser. We fill a large dispenser with water and keep it in the fridge for cold water. I was initially skeptical at first and tried the unfiltered tap water and there was a significant taste difference. The taste is very comparable to bottled water, I think it’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Davila

customer_reviews.title: Safe Water = Tasty Water
customer_reviews.text: I live in Chicago where the water has 9 ppb of lead in it (somehow legal but definitely not healthy), so I was looking for a filter specifically to take heavy metals out of our drinking water. This filter was a great choice. It looks cool on the counter, takes up no more room than a large water bottle and makes our water taste so much better. I haven't done any fancy tests or anything, but I feel confident that our water is much cleaner and healthier. FYI, last I checked this product was significantly cheaper on the manufacturers website, and I think they had free shipping. Either way, get it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: For a countertop water filtration this 1050 model really impressed me. After reading many reviews on a lot of competitors I decided for the price , ease of set up, made in the USA, and most important, their special filter that removes a lot more than just odor and chlorine. This removed everything I wanted but fluoride and when I am ready to upgrade to a reverse osmosis system I will buy from Apex again. The package arrived in perfect condition, no missing items, easy installation. I live in a rental so this was the best choice for me and I am glad I chose Apex.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Jenner

customer_reviews.title: One year and still like new
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year now and It's still working great! Very happy with it, smooth tasting water and the filter hides nicely by the sink. I haven't noticed any bacteria growth or iron water deposits. Everything has stayed clean and working fine. The hardest part is changing the filter, but I managed to do it pretty easily. The trick is you can't use the tool it came with alone, you have to use leverage. You have to get the bottom and housing going in opposite directions to unscrew successfully. Someone else explained it on here very well. Using a second tool is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: No customer service and tastes horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste was horrible my son won’t drink it. I sent a message to the company and never heard back from them. I’m not sure if there was something wrong with it but no response was not acceptable. I was hoping to be able to work out the issue. Due to family emergency I was unable to return it in time. So now I’m stuck with a very expensive item that will end up going to the land fill. Do not recommend this or the company! I never write reviews but this was on of the worst experiences!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heddy

customer_reviews.title: Filter works fine - Alkaline enhancement  only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Install, filters the Houston City water pretty good- But we really wanted the alkaline enhancement which after PH Strip testing every month only lasted 3 months at 1/2 to 1 gallon a day and now has the same PH as the tap water it comes from. Going to see if we can find better filters for it but i would not recommend this product if Alkaline water is what you are looking for. BTW to counter the mold issue some buyers experienced we covered our filter to avoid sunlight,. which worked. I would have given it 5 stars if the water had lasted at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gene G

customer_reviews.title: Works, worth the money, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Felt like paying it forward and leaving a nice review for a product I use every day and don't have a single complaint about. Don't have much detail to leave but I'd say this: > Greatly improves the taste of my water near Berkeley, CA > Decent price point (could be less expensive, but isn't too bad) > Easy to use, integrates well into my kitchen (installing a new filter is tricky at first, so google how to do it and then it's easy) Well worth the purchase. I've bought 3 replacement filters so far and will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I have arthritis and the PH balance has helped the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and the PH balance has helped the pain in my joints tremendously. Got to give it a 5 star here. In their directions they did not mention you might need to add washer to sink attachment to stop leak in swivel. Also Apex needs to give percentages of how much heavy metal is removed. Turns out it is only 90 %. I prefer 99%. I guess that's why they don't tell you. It is a bit misleading to say it removes heavy metals without percentages. From other reviews I am worried about changing filters. Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: Best investment you could do for yourself, so do yourself a favor and invest in some high quality H2O. You will be able to taste the difference. Install is very easy and depending on what type of faucet you have, it does come with different attachments. THE ONLY DOWN FALL IS THE HOSE! THE LINE THAT CONNECTS YOUR FILTER TO YOUR FAUCET DOES GET IN THE WAY WHEN WASHING DISHES SO KEEP THAT IN MIND. UNSELL YOU HAVE A SEPARATE FAUCET THEN IT SHOULD BE NO PROBLEM
customer_reviews.author: bob103

customer_reviews.title: a great value buy
customer_reviews.text: Very user-friendly and easy to install will see how the filter replacement when that time comes our house had a very unusual size kitchen sink so I had to put it in the bathroom for now until I go get a proper valve stem that sized correctly for it for the kitchen but it works and functions very well only thing that upset me is that I ordered a white one and I got the clear one instead I don’t know why they give you the option to choose they just send you a clear one
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Best economical purchase ever! No more buying plastic water bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Best water purifier I've ever owned. Going on over 2 years now and buying refills every 6 months. I no longer need to buy water bottles every again. Economical. Love the ease of obtaining clean fresh drinking water at all times. The pH is perfect for coffee brewing. No more heart burn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: -Alkaline water benefits -Taste is great - Installation was super easy and straight forward - Saved me 2 trips a week to fill multiple 5 gallons water bottles. - Price is reasonable. - Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Filter stop running less than 3 months...No where near 750 Gallon
customer_reviews.text: Filler did not last 3 months...No way i used 750 gallons of water out of this...and it's now only dripping....I DO NOT think there statement is true..."Each filter can filter up to 750 gallons of drinking water before a replacement filter is needed". No way...
customer_reviews.author: bronx

customer_reviews.title: really making life better
customer_reviews.text: i am truly thankful that i stopped wasting my time with all the other filter systems and found this . I have tried so many and they have all been a waste of money and time. Apex is the one to buy, you will not be disappointed. I love water now more than soda and i love soda. I can't believe that i put up with stench and bad after taste from other so called systems for so long. I would be angry now because of it but because i am now drinking such good water such great water all that doesn't mater to me any more. I am that happy and content.
customer_reviews.author: patrick mott

customer_reviews.title: Makes my water drinkable again.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been using this for about 2 weeks and it seems to work as promised. I believe it cleans the water as well as take out the chlorine and chloramine. I'm no longer using bottled water and I'm using this to purify a New York City tap water. We'll update this in a couple of months. But as for right now I like it and would buy it again as well as recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: hapkijo

customer_reviews.title: Life of Filter?????
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the complete Filter in April 2017. Today I tested the pH and it is 6.0. My issue with this product has aways been how to measure be the life as there is no indication when you have filtered 1500 liters. My recommendation is to monitor the pH on arrival and monthly thereafter. Obviously I require a new filter but will purchase a complete unit as the diverter is becoming difficult to turn.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Truly Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: We were done going to the water shop because it was tiring, costly and we found out that the water we were drinking was not really filtered (Acidic). We had to test the PH balance for us to know. We had to thoroughly search in Amazon good reviews on a water filtration system and came across this Apex Countertop. It was easy to install and as you can see with my photo, the test kit truly determined that the water that came out of it is truly Alkaline. Now we surely know that the water we are drinking is safe and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Camz

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good filter
customer_reviews.text: I have used water filters for years due to the smell of the water in my town. I needed a new filter, my old one was getting very noisy. I read some reviews and the Apex counter filter got very high reports. The price seemed very reasonable and so I ordered one. When it arrived I read the instructions, as brief and easy as they were, and hooked up the filter to my kitchen faucet. It was easy to hook up and works great. No bad water smell or taste. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is not great...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprized by this product. It does a good job at removing the taste of chlorine. The municipal water here in San Rafael, CA is not great and this filter does not fix it. The test for me is: pour a glass of water and let is sit for an hour. Then taste it. Definitely not neutral. I reduced the pressure of the water supply to the filter and it filters slowly but no difference. Better than from the faucet but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise250

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Budget Alternative!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched ionizers after our expensive, yet long outdated Jupiter died. We couldn't afford to going rate for something similar, so I looked for lower budget ones. I was very happy to come across this and we are very happy with it! It is very compact so it doesn't take up much space and fits neatly by the sink. I love that it is clear and you can see all the layers it filters through. It doesn't have the option to set the PH level like the fancier ones do, but for the price this is an excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and big holes...
customer_reviews.text: The Apex Water Filter I ordered is good overall except: - sometimes it produces bubbles that does not subside easily like you would see in a normal water running in a pressurized tank and we are wondering what chemical or item is in the filter that produces the bubbles. - also, the holes on filter or regulator (attached photo) are too big- and water coming out of it is too strong. This may be a particular case for New York (where water pressure is quite strong). This item is not very useful here.
customer_reviews.author: JGarana

customer_reviews.title: Easy install & works well!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a park with old water lines. Have gotten sick from the at times bad water. This item works great for myself and my two dogs. Tastes good and has eliminated buying drinking water, and storing all those bottles or jugs. Less waste in the landfill too. I did alot of research before settling on this product. Came fast and preforms as expected. BTW. Install was easy.. although I didn't need, unit came with many adapters...the attached one worked fine for me. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This filter works very well for us here in North Cal. With the alkaline added, we boil it and cool it down to mix with formula for my boy, and he hardly had any diaper rash at home. Unlike in the hospital, same formula and different water source cause a big rash on him, sample test of his st**l comes out be very acidic (5.5). We just installed a second one just because I am too lazy to replace the filter inside (which I already ordered an extra filter). So I am going to rotate the two units. We had a clear one, the algae issue I think rise from having the unit expose to direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: YZDave

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter
customer_reviews.text: Great investment, easy installment. The only thing I don't like about it is that it has to sit close to the faucet taking up room on sink so if you don't place it strategically, you'll bump into it or it may tip over. Thankfully it's just myself and mom at home so we haven't run into that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Best water filter ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this water filter. I have been buying bottled water for years and finally decided to get a filter for my home so that I could just refill bottles and not have to carry heavy packs of bottles and fill the local dump with empty bottles. I researched may different options and decided this was the best for me. It was incredibly easy to hook up, just removed the aeriator on the faucet and attach the filter. The water is delicious and I'm drinking more water than ever, which will make my doctor very happy. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Paula W.

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic threaded washer that is included leaks all over the place. For the money there must be a better filter than this.
customer_reviews.author: arob

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install water tastes great. I use it at my kitchen sink for making out treated town water drinkable. Only issue is the pin came out of the diverter that connects to the spout and was lost so it doesn’t stop itself from rotating too far. This allows water to come out of both spouts at the same time unless you have it in the right spot. Fortunately it is something I can live with.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: my water tastes better and does not leave spots on my glassware anymore
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is filtering everything it says because I have not tested it. However, my water tastes better and does not leave spots on my glassware anymore. It comes out in a steady stream. I had to go to the hardware store to purchase another o-ring, but that was less than a dollar and makes it work wonderfully. I'm glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn't taste very good after it's gone through the filter.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much water I run through this thing, it still tastes like sulfur after it's gone through the filter. Contacted customer service, and they said it was because of my hot water heater (I don't think that's how water filters are supposed to work). Ended up having to buy a Pur refillable filter that stays in my fridge, and the same water through that filter tastes fine. So for me it was a big waste of money. Very cool idea though to have it come right from the sink and not have to refill a jug.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area with very hard and highly chlorinated water. This filter seems to lower the hardness and chlorine taste. Not as much as I would want (like purified water level) but it still makes the water drinkable. I will update my review in a couple of months ... I am not sure I will renew the cartridge when it is out of commission. I think I will buy those reverse osmotic filters. They are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Scrooge McDuck

customer_reviews.title: changing the filter faster than you expect
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of normal use, give it 3 stars not 5, because their advertisements say that the filter lasts for a period of approximately 4-5 months of normal use, while I tell you the truth, you will need to change the filter after two to three months only!!
customer_reviews.author: Ari - NYC

customer_reviews.title: Yay! My water tastes like smooth water!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly water smells and tastes like "nothing" verses whatever it tasted like before. My dad came over and was skeptical about my non-Britta purchase, we did a side by side comparison and before he drank he could smell the difference between the filtered/unfiltered and he actually sounded impressed. I live in a small city that isn't known for its terrible water (to my knowledge) yet the difference is obvious. Also I had questions and the seller was instantly helpful. Fits neatly on the counter, and the white cord doesn't get in the way; I've laced it behind the fixture a bit and didn't need to zip-tie. I've had it a few days now, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Investment

So, I called their customer service and told them about the issue and they sent me a new filter in about less then a week!!!!! Their customer service is Excellent!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Leaking part

customer_reviews.author: ali p valls

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water

A few of my friends are on their way to order the filter.

customer_reviews.title: It's great till you need to switch the filter.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This filter removes several pollutants from the drinking water and this is the best drinking water I think I've ever had. customer_reviews.title: Best water filter system i've ever owned

Would recommend and would purchase again without hesitation. I've tried numberous water pitchers with the built in filters, I've tried the pur filter that hangs off of the faucet like a growth or tumor and I've also tired the culligan water cooler with a monthly bill. In my opinion this option is the best. Worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loveland

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure at first if this was a good machine. However, it is a great machine so far! It is easy to set up and it comes with some different options for different sinks. In which, I thought was very helpful. I also found the water to taste great. It is easy maintenance , and it very easy to use! I read some reviews about the difficulty in replacing the water filter. I had not gotten to that stage just yet but so far. The water filter has been a wonderful investment.
customer_reviews.author: ShopLady

customer_reviews.title: Works grear
customer_reviews.text: Works great... allows a lot of water to flow out... only thing is the lil silver nozzle.that controls the purification system fell off....i guess it didn't have enough sealant on it when they made it at the warehouse...I have had it for about a month now...
customer_reviews.author: Shanietria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to install, taking approximately 10 minutes to get up and running. The water tastes great and even smells pure (we have city water). Very pleased with this product. Have already ordered a second unit for the office.

customer_reviews.title: No more chemical smelling water!

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It

I recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade their water filter.

customer_reviews.title: Good investment if you buy water by the gallon.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter if the filter replacements are expensive, as a continuous investment, you still be saving money by the gallon with this item, don't have to worry to buy water by the gallon, it's there where I want it. product_meta.title: Apex Countertop Drinking Water Filter, Alkaline, Clear (MR-1050)
product_meta.description: APEX has been committed to providing clean drinking water since it was founded in Gardenia, California in 1997. Since about 60% of the human body is made up of water, it’s vitally important that the water you drink is pure and healthy for you. Do you wonder if your drinking water is actually safe or if it’s making you sick? Most of us think our water is clean when it comes out of the faucet. There might actually be a lot of impurities that you can’t see, smell, or even taste. APEX’s Clear Countertop Alkaline Water Filter System is the solution you need to ensure that the water you drink is free of the many contaminants that seep into groundwater supplies. Water from kitchen faucets may be fine for washing dishes – but drinking it is entirely different. If you are looking for a kitchen water filter system, consider APEX water filters. This APEX water filtering system comes as a complete water purification kit that is simple to install and use. It attaches easily to most standard kitchen faucets with easy do-it-yourself installation. Simply remove the aerator screen (bubbler screen) from the faucet and screw on the collar of the APEX diverter valve. APEX Clear Countertop Alkaline Drinking Water Filter System for home faucets removes impurities and chemicals. Tiny particles and contaminants are removed through carbon block filters that remove mercury, pesticides, chlorine, radon, and more from your family’s drinking water. This super advanced water purification process removes contaminants that you can’t see or smell in your tap water. APEX water purifier systems also remove sediment and rust. Each filter can filter up to 750 gallons of drinking water before a replacement filter is needed. APEX strictly adheres to the National Safety Foundation’s certified water filter safety standards and requirements. We follow the guidelines of the NSF and the FDA to ensure that APEX filtered water is clean and safe for your family, giving you one less thing to worry about.
